mapper.select:
select
from sys_menu sm
and sm.id=#{id}
order by sm.order asc

select
from sys_menu sm left join sys_role_menu srm on sm.id=srm.menu_id left join sys_role sr on sr.id=srm.role_id left join sys_account_role sar on sar.role_id=sr.id where sar.account_id=#{id}

select DISTINCT (sm.id), sm.name, sm.`remark`, sm.path, sm.icon, sm.order, sm.enable from sys_account sa left join sys_account_role sar on sar.account_id=sa.id left join sys_role sr on sr.id=sar.role_id left join sys_role_menu srm on sr.id=srm.role_id left join sys_menu sm on sm.id=srm.menu_id where sa.id = #{id} and sm.name is not null and sm.del=0 and srm.del=0 and sr.del=0 order by sm.order asc
select count(id) from sys_menu sm where sm.parent_id = #{parentId} limit 1
